title: Embroidered Picture, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, speckling and running stitches on plain weave foundation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased at John Wanamakers.
description: Rural landscape with a pond, buildings, animals and a shepherdess, in black silk on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, early 19th century.Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, speckling and running stitches on plain weave foundation. 1975-86-15.
